info.description: This is the Identity Provider for the UKCRC Tissue Directory API. It serves one purpose: to take credentials via Basic Auth (over HTTPS), and return an Identity JWT if authentication is successful. This JWT can then be used for authorisation purposes.
info.title: UKCRC Tissue Directory Identity Provider

tags.description: Request an Identity JWT for a set of credentials
